name: Flappy Bird in Forest [BETA]
description:
Flappy Bird in Forest (FBIF) is a simple game made on Scratch. This game asks us to pass pipes of different heights in order to achieve victory. In this game, you can feel DAY AND NIGHT!

Information :

  • This game is still under development, if you find a bug you can report it on the discussion board below.
  • We will try to provide updates once a week.
  • Application for ANDROID is in progress.

Controls :

  • Spam SPACE to Jump
  • GREEN FLAG to Start
